name: CitationTool
tagline: WIndows Forms Application for citing MLA and APA (C#)
body:
### Citation Tool
CitationTool is a C# program that provides a convenient way to cite your references. 

### Current Features
* Supports MLA and APA
* Supports Book and Ebook 

### Features To Come
* Film, Journal, Magazine, Website, Wiki citations
- Support Chicago Style

### Screenshots


### Authors and Contributors
In 2010, @ammunoz.

### Support or Contact
Any question? Send me an [e-mail](munozamb+citationtool@gmail.com).
